# Submission Checklist

- [ ] Verify all issue tasks
- [ ] Set PR title as `<Issue Title> <Issue Number>`
- [ ] Add "closes #<ISSUE_NUMBER>"
- [ ] Add labels
- [ ] Verify CI passes
- [ ] Add reviewers
- [ ] Notify team

# Reviewer Checklist

- [ ] Verify all issue tasks
- [ ] Verify branch name
- [ ] Verify CI passes
- [ ] Verify minimal changes
- [ ] Verify tests

# Post-Approval Actions

- [ ] Approve PR
- [ ] Notify team members
- [ ] Merge PR
- [ ] Write praise
